name: @tsdotnet/text-utility
description: A set of commonly used functions for manipulating and formatting strings.
author: electricessence

scripts.build:cjs: rimraf dist && tsc && copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.d.ts dist
scripts.build:esm: rimraf temp-esm && tsc -p tsconfig.esm.json --outDir temp-esm && node -e "require('fs').readdirSync('temp-esm').forEach(f=>{if(f.endsWith('.js')){require('fs').copyFileSync('temp-esm/'+f,'dist/'+f.replace('.js','.mjs'));} if(f.endsWith('.js.map')){require('fs').copyFileSync('temp-esm/'+f,'dist/'+f.replace('.js.map','.mjs.map'));}});" && rimraf temp-esm
scripts.build: pnpm i && pnpm run build:cjs && pnpm run build:esm
scripts.precommit: pnpm i && concurrently "pnpm:lint" "pnpm:test" && concurrently "pnpm:build:*" && pnpm run validate && git status -s
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run build && pnpm run validate && pnpm run test
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && pnpm run docs && git add -A && git commit -m "Updated docs." docs && git push
